mutants.code:
def set_set_bit(x: int, y: int, l: int, r: int) -> int:
    mask = (1 << r - l + 1) + 1
    mask = mask << l - 1
    mask = mask & y
    x = x | mask
    return x

def set_set_bit(x: int, y: int, l: int, r: int) -> int:
    mask = (1 << r - l + 1) * 1
    mask = mask << l - 1
    mask = mask & y
    x = x | mask
    return x

def set_set_bit(x: int, y: int, l: int, r: int) -> int:
    mask = (1 << r - l + 1) - 1
    mask = mask << l - 1
    mask = mask | y
    x = x | mask
    return x

def set_set_bit(x: int, y: int, l: int, r: int) -> int:
